function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Severe restrictions on travel leading to reduced energy use and emissions from transportation","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact on global energy supply chains and energy firms","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global trade shrinking by 32%","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"As many as 300 million people losing their jobs","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Global economic contraction due to pandemic impact","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Health care sector liquidity and small business support","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lockdown measures to prevent the spread of the disease","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Easily transmissible virus","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High infection to fatality ratio","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disruption of societal norms and governance","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to high circulation and close proximity in built-up areas.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and air circulation in the car parking building.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Incorrect percentage calculations for circulation and services areas","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Misinterpretation of percentages for car parking and circulation areas","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"High rate of car parking area to the users reduced during the pandemic","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Demanded cost of adaptation for building transformation","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"}]}
